name: Reverence
description:
A small experimental audio world, including crossfading tracks and multiple areas.

Use your mouse to explore the game world and listen to the unique background music belonging in each area. Some sound effects have been hand-placed around as well.

This game was made as a student project between April and May of 2018, with the goal of incorporating sounds and music into an environmental space. This project is a small game world created to provide an audio experience.
